ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:34:40 [Issue ID 4000-667669] urn:comicvine:4000-667669 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/667669
ComicInfo.Summary: Billy Blue joins La Sirena's pirate crew and they attack Major Sly's British warship in order to rescue Ophelia. Rather than be rescued, however, Ophelia refuses to go with Sirena and, instead, takes her own life. As Sirena and Billy leave the English ship, they kill the bestial child El Nino causing the Priest to vow vengeance. With Ophelia gone from her life, La Sirena takes Billy as a lover.
ComicInfo.Tags: Billy Blue,El Nino (death),Jack Sly,La Sirena,Ophelia Strong (death),The Father
ComicInfo.Title: Los Dorados
